definitions.definition: A belief that spirits inhabit some or all classes of natural objects or phenomena .
A belief that an immaterial force animates the universe .
A doctrine that animal life is produced by an immaterial spirit.

main_definition: A belief that spirits inhabit some or all classes of natural objects or phenomena .
secondary_definitions: A belief that an immaterial force animates the universe .
( dated ) A doctrine that animal life is produced by an immaterial spirit.
